title: My account is level 13 but the forums still list me as level 1?
body: Title. Can't post hardly anywhere because according to the site I haven't even played a single game. 0.o

replies.body:
This sometimes happens if you hadn't used the Boards in a while, as your Boards Profile has to sync with your Summoner (game) profile. It looks like your level has updated, so you should be good to go.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Have you tried refreshing the page? Maybe cleaning out your cache? Resetting your computer? 

If none of those works, you could try using another browser, like Chrome, Firefox, Internet Explorer, etc.
